amendment.description: Amendment adds to the monitoring and evaluation system established in the bill, a requirement to look at the illegal southbound flow of cash.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part C of House Report 111-143 to add to the monitoring and evaluation system established in the bill a requirement to look at the illegal southbound flow of cash.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kirkpatrick (AZ) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kirkpatrick (AZ) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mrs. Kirkpatrick (AZ).
